projects.description: The page is structured to give random quotes naming the source, genre and year
This project begins with either 64 or 44 students displayed and the pagination is set to only show 10 students per page until the last page is reached showing only 4 remaining students

This registration form is for a technical conference and the HTML & CSS files are designed where the user must at least complete the name, email, at least one activity, and method of payment.” I have built in validations with requirements that display the requirements if not met on each section.
This is a word building game, guessing the correct phrase before running out of 5 live hearts to win”. The user looses one heart with each wrong guess and 5 misses, game over displays

An employee directory for remote employees was created to display 12 employees randomly at a time. Their images are show and minimal info until clicked, then a modal popup displays details on the chosen employee
